TopicTitle: Visual bug? W.A.D.? Produced by a Mod? Shock Wave when switching to Orbital Map view.

Articles.Content:
When I press "M" to switch to Orbital View, I see a Shock wave/Lens flare coming from my active ship.

It's Cone shaped and looks allot like the the "Fighter Jet Breaking the Sound Barrier" photos you see.

Only problem is it fills half my screen. (Lasts about 1/2 second)

Personally I find it annoying and I never see it in any of the KSP YouTube videos I've seen.

Anyone have a clue as to what is causing this?

Thanks
Graphical bug i'm afraid. I never got something like that, or seen it on streams, YT clips or screenshots of other people.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111715-Odd-artifact-while-zooming-map-randomly-flashing-in-flight - if it's that, then yes it was a mod.
Yes thats what it looks like. Thanks for the link.
